Posts.Title: For those on Hormone Therapy.........

Posts.Content: Still haven't got my details listed yet , i don't seem to be fully connected to the site ?? My psa went up this month from 17 - 24,, but when i started on zytiga it was 56 or so,, 2 months ago... feeling pretty good and still looking for a beautiful spring !!! ðŸ¤ â™¥
Posts.Title: First post - stage 4 metastatic prostate cancer

Posts.Content: This is first post I've been diagnosed with metastatic stage 4 prostrate cancer... had one round of docetaxel with lupron and xgeva, then rested for a couple of months.. now im on zytiga with the lupron and xgeva.. my psa went from 550 in jan 2017 to 17 now , have labs tomorrow and hoping for single digits... feeling pretty good for an 80 year old white american male with advanced cancer.. sleeping well and not to much pain.. looking forward to a beautiful spring !!!
Posts.Title: First post - stage 4 metastatic prostate cancer

Posts.Content: Yes, every day above ground is a good day... trying to put in my details, but haven't got it figured out yet...

Posts.Content: This is first post I've been diagnosed with metastatic stage 4 prostrate cancer... had one round of docetaxel with lupron and xgeva, then rested for a couple of months.. now im on zytiga with the lupron and xgeva.. my psa went from 550 in jan 2017 to 17 now , have labs tomorrow and hoping for single digits... feeling pretty good for an 80 year old white american male with advanced cancer.. sleeping well and not to much pain.. looking forward to a beautiful spring !!!
Posts.Title: First post - stage 4 metastatic prostate cancer

Posts.Content: I had docetaxel with lupron and xgeva 4/5/2017,, only lost 1/2 my hair, only vomited a couple of times (i had anti vomiting pills) felt bad on several occasions, but at the end my PSA went from 550 to 55 and after a few weeks felt really good and my hair is all comming back, even curlyer than before... it was totally worth it !!! Now on zytiga and prednisone with lupron and xgeva.. (forgot - i had prednisone with the docetaxel also) average life on zytiga 4 years ,,, so keep on trucking
Posts.Title: Started Chemotherapy

Now on zytiga and prednisone with lupron and xgeva.. (forgot - i had prednisone with the docetaxel also) average life on zytiga 4 years ,,, so keep on trucking
Posts.Title: Started Chemotherapy

Posts.Content: I can tell i would like your husband,, hang in there and tuff love is a good thing... i te'll my wife what she can say and ask the doctor,, but she ignors me.. ive been dx with metastatic stage 4 prostrate cancer and am 80.. i went to doctors and they must have all been dumb s#%&s.. talk to your medical team and get 2nd and 3rd opinions, this is important, because it opens up options.. emjoy life and have a good month
